website_summaries.verdict: Excellent shock and vibration resistance versus other air impact wrenches. Offered at reasonable price.
pros: Placement of forward and reverse switch means it can be operated with one hand
Maximum torque of 650 ft-lbs, which provides enough power for most jobs around the home
Feels well balanced when you're using it
cons: Requires plenty of air pressure to work
Won't perform as well on heavy-duty jobs

customer_reviews.title: I don't restrict the air flow by use 1/4" connectors at the gun like so many do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 30 year old CP impact gun that finally gave up the ghost. It seems to me a worthy successor. If it has enough air, it has plenty of power. I usually run at 125psi, through 3/8" hose, fittings and connectors right to the gun. I don't restrict the air flow by use 1/4" connectors at the gun like so many do. (I noticed quite a jump in power when I switched to 3/8") Plenty of torque, it has broken loose every thing I have tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: gsiegel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The quietest impact wrench in the shop. Remember, a quiet impact wrench protects your hearing. Master technicians have never gone wrong with Dewalt around here. I will continue to support Dewalt, especially now when they have started factoring in the United States, bringing our jobs and exceptional quality back. Though this is not made in US, it delivers exceptional power and torque in the everyday job, even more than other well known brands.
customer_reviews.author: The technician

customer_reviews.title: Stong
customer_reviews.text: Good impact driver. Bought to tackle my struts. Still waiting on parts but this thing takes lug nuts off with ease. Easy use. Has 3 different speeds which comes in handy too. Used to take off struts from car. Took a few seconds, but the bolts came off with ease. Can't imagine doing it by hand. These botls were torqued to around 150#. Buy it and jus remember to oil. Great impact tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Candilasa

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not Replace my old Impact Wrench Earlier
customer_reviews.text: I kept telling myself to go get a replacement wrench due to the "weakness" of my old wrench. I had some serious work to do on my vehicle so I made the leap and got this wrench. There was not a single bolt this thing could not break loose, including the harmonic balancer bolt. It is so much quieter, lighter and stronger than my old wrench. If you are looking for a great wrench at a good price - this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a year. Full time mechanic, gets used 10.5 hours per day 5 days a week, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chevyguy

customer_reviews.title: Use suggested air compressor with correct air output.
customer_reviews.text: I give this tool 3 stars only because of its compact size, i could not fairly judge its performance. For those who are looking to buy this impact driver, i suggest having the correct air compressor. 5.0cfm at 90psi. I have a 6gal compressor with 2.9cfm at 90psi and bought this driver. In reading the reviews someone said my compressor would work. IT DID NOT. The driver could not output the max amount of torque to remove any lug nuts on my vehicle. So make sure you have the recommended compressor this tool suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Jose DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this impact gun
customer_reviews.text: I have this paired up with an old Craftsman 919 30 gallon 150 psi compressor, and it zips lug bolts off with ease, I've also used it to remove a steering knuckle and hub bearings, it broke the spindle nut with no problem at all. So far it's doing its job without complaints. The weight of this tool is not bad, I fight more with the air hose than the impact gun I should have gotten a swivel connector. But overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ambroz

customer_reviews.title: Great Impact Wrench
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap impact wrench for ages. It was almost not worth getting out most of the time. I would have to break lugs free with a tire iron most of the time, and the wrench was only good for getting them on/off quickly after that. I didn't trust it to put them back on tight enough either. This one is like a hot knife through butter. Smooth and quiet. Took my lugs off and didn't waste a bunch of air doing it. Very efficient. I took off an entire wheel before my compressor started running again, and frankly, that is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: AbqPhil

customer_reviews.title: Legendary DeWalt Quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty Tool for Profession Use and will last a home user a Lifetime. Only complaint is using DeWalt color of Yellow shows dirt and makes tool look dingy quickly, DeWalt should incorporate another color scheme for tools used in greasy environments. We like our tools to look good and its impossible to keep a Yellow tool looking good
customer_reviews.author: REMROB

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have dewalt everything. This one seems to be either a bad one or it's just weak. I have a dewalt compressor I hooked up with this. Could not get my lug nuts off. I have a 09 tundra. Have to manually remove. What's the point of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the single best air tool in its class for the money. You cant go wrong with a Dewalt air gun that goes up to 650# torque for just over $100.00. If your an Auto Enthusiast - DIYer, this is a must have in your set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weisdorfer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic directional switch, more power then a mac 1/2 impact and not as loud
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love the product (but) the plastic on the directional switch, (really) and the only way to put oil in the bottom is either thru the air coupler or the open part on the bottom of the gun. Not all bad, love the way the gun looks, I tested this gun against a MAC air gun and the MAC lost. So not lacking in the performance section. Hope they get rid of the plastic directional switch.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of torque
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt doesn't disappoint with this tool. I have a 21 gallon air tank, and used this DeWalt impact wrench to take off lugnuts on a 2018 Honda Odyssey. This tool has a lot of power and took off the lugnut without hesitation. Product is very durable, and lightweight for an impact wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Cary

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact and relatively quiet. Compared to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact and relatively quiet. Compared to a buddies Air cat and a Harbor Freight Earthquake. This was much closer to the more expensive AirCat in terms of quality of build and power. Removed the rusty lug nuts on my F250 diesel without issue. Will update review when I get more time on the gun. Just placed Milton Hi Flow fittings on this, it is a different gun. It was good before now it is unstoppable. Used it to remove the blade nuts from a 5' brush hog!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ollbuster

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have when working on your vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Use this to work on my corvette and my other everyday vehicles, has plenty of power and it works well even when used with a pancake compressor
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE MELISTAS

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt 1/2 drive impact wrench...Totally Excellent
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt 1/2 drive impact wrench...Totally Excellent quality, well balanced, clear controls, not too heavy, LOTS OF POWER! Really works well where my HF brand unit did not. No need to get out a lug wrench for stuck lug nuts now, even using with relatively small air compressor. Highly recommended. Priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Midwest

customer_reviews.title: This technicians new best friend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a technician and I use my impact all day every day I've always used snap on but after my last one died I refused to spend so much money on something that just doesn't last for what you pay this impact is quieter and just as strong you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Marinez

customer_reviews.title: Trusty
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now and it’s been great, I really trust this brand and I haven’t had any issues with it. Not a single bolt have I come across that this thing couldn’t loosen. I like the level feature and the reverse trigger. Also the metal guards it has to protect the impact against hard impacts lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: This impact is a beast. I needed this to change blades on my mower, I had bought another brand and it was to weak to remove the bolts even after adjusting the air pressure up higher than recommended. Got this Dewalt and I spent more time getting the mower lifted up than actually changing the blades
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Best impact
customer_reviews.text: Best value impact I’ve ever used. Anything else around this price range is garbage. Only downside about this is that it doesn’t say snap on xD Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Franks

customer_reviews.title: Used everyday best gun I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday best gun I've ever owned..have a Mac payed over $500 and a snap on payed over $600 . They sit in the tool box now
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this impact now for a few months and I cannot get this thing to work for the life of me, very weak feeling. I find it collecting dust more than anything. I really needed this for a project but it let me down hard.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: This got me worked on my Audi 2001 TT axle ...
customer_reviews.text: This got me worked on my Audi 2001 TT axle nut. It was frozen and hard to loosen with break bar with my weight on it. It worked with 120 psi 4.5 compressor (Chicago Pneumatic product)
customer_reviews.author: Sang Y Lee

customer_reviews.title: Came with a security tag that I had to take apart
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dads birthday and it came with a security tag making me think it was possibly stolen. I don't know but it was pretty easy taking it off. Hopefully the impact gun works. It seems like a quality tool but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day in the field, beat it up, it keeps on going. The controls are SUPERB for fast actions. Had an Aircat 1150 but it malfunctioned and the controls were slower to operate. For the price this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wrench
customer_reviews.text: I like the controls, and how they are placed. Has lots of torque, had to turn it down for wheel lugs. Pretty quiet, also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance and Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this new air impact. It is easy to hold, the controls are great, and delivers outstanding adjustable and maximum torque for automotive when used with impact sockets.
customer_reviews.author: James Cogil

customer_reviews.title: Great, powerful impact wrench
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of adjustable power. Only odd thing is the poorly written instructions. Hadn't seen that before from Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I like it, and am impressed
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, I have only used a few times so far, but this unit has a lot of power, granted I have only used on a few lug nuts, but this thing is a beast, I had a old Rockwell that I have had for 35 years and it finally gave up, so I bought this to replace it, (I have felt Dewalt has done me good on corded and cordless power tools, this thing is light weight and looks good, I have 3/8 through 1 inch air impacts, and I am impressed with this unit,
customer_reviews.author: B D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful impact wrench just what I need to work on my car and truck tires, brakes rotors etc. removes lugs easily with no issues. Has three settings, I definitely need to upgrade my air compressor way to small for this impact wrench. Highly recommend this tool for anyone who works on their own car.
customer_reviews.author: Jpena325

customer_reviews.title: It's comparable to snap on!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy but strong!!!!!! This is a review of 5 months of constant use and abuse. Everybody at the shop I work at use it. It's strong and powerful. The bad ....the lever to switch between left and right should have been in a different location because sometimes your finger will switch it. It's still goin strong. I have dropped it more then 20x and still working.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel r.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed, solid feel, does the job and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Value and usefulness!
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt tools are the best I have ever had. This impact fit the bill for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal D. Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Working in a medium Duty School Bus Shop, Used on inner and outer nuts torqued to 500 foot pounds this gun is able to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: I am a Dewalt man and am very pleased with their products
customer_reviews.text: I am a Dewalt man and am very pleased with their products. Works great and I didn't expect anything else, just a very good tool.
customer_reviews.author: willys46cj2a

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to put it to a heavy duty test yet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for light stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job only on high flow. For my light mechanic jobs on my cars it does fine. Wish it had a bit more torque.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Medina

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Tool for my Collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great impact wrench. It has allot of power as long as you have the air behind it. I love the 3 settings you can use and the plastic forward/reverse switch works well also. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gugino

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in January and now it will no longer work. I can literally keep it from turning by holding the socket with my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Carson

customer_reviews.title: If you need to torque smithing over 100 ft lbs this makes much easier to do
customer_reviews.text: Great torque and power for having 650 ft lbs loosens up nuts bolts easier worth the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Krj

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hitting impact
customer_reviews.text: This impact gun has worked great on every job I have used it on. Hard hitting double action provides enough torque to break just about anything loose. Easy to use operation makes it my favorite impact.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: This tool makes an IMPACT!
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money. I'm still not sure how they managed to put so much into such an affordable tool.
customer_reviews.author: John King

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. I use it when I work on my car.
customer_reviews.author: N. Burris

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly the way it is described.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase, it's exactly what I wanted. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: bruce63

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power on the high setting. I found myself needing to set it on the middle setting to remove properly torqued lug nuts. Durable tool with easy to adjust settings. The only thing I would change would be the forward and reverse lever as it moves fairly easy and I found myself bumping it occasionally with it next to the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet impact
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for rotating tires. I use this on my 8 gallon husky compressor. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Bouch

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality impact wrench. Could not have accomplished certain tasks without it. So far no issues
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Perfect for tires and mower blades!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works really well to take mower blades off and the tires on my vehicles. I bought this compressor Campbell Hausfeld 8gal Oil Free Air Compressor and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Hook it right up to my trucks air tanks and take it on th he road with me too!
customer_reviews.author: Maria K

customer_reviews.title: Speed and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know I'll use any other impact again, a part from this. Ive been using it for some years and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: PETER ASARE

customer_reviews.title: A good driver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the generic driver I had was unable to loosen a bolt I needed to remove. No problem are all for this. Like all Dewalt tools I own, it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Vin Sumerlin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I think this impact wrench can stand up against some high priced ones out there. I've had snap-ons, and some Ingersoll rand guns and for less half the price, this is really a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Carag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This impact is great. Fairly quiet, powerful, and doesn't blow dirt in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase, I work at a dealership and use this for work. Gets the lug nuts off without an issue. Their are better stronger options but this is a perfect and affordable one, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. gets off tough nuts and bolts. no problems so far.plenty of power
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Only thing i don't like is the forward/reverse toggle switch
customer_reviews.text: Only thing i don't like is the forward/reverse toggle switch. I'm used to the push button kind and this feels awkward to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great impact for automotive shop use. Don’t listen to all the bad reviews. I suspect all the claims that the gun is underpowered come from people who are using it with a 5 gallon pancake compressor...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Has tons of torque
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Has tons of torque, haven't had any problems yet and I've had it for several months.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool, feels good in your hand, has plenty of torque and quality up to DeWalt standards. Will be putting it to more use in the warmer weather, so we see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Herzfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one only due to giving my old one to my co worker and I would put my five year old dewalt to any snap on half inch
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: So far it has performed flawlessly it’s a dewalt what else needs to be said
customer_reviews.author: Ray Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and quality feels great
customer_reviews.text: My husbands first impact and I am sure he is hooked! Works great and quality feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Good impact
customer_reviews.text: I have used this impact for a year and half and it has done well so far. It didn't work on a hand full of cars before but they were over torqued to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is s good tool.
customer_reviews.text: They have to redesign the rotation direction switch - it is inconvenient. Overall it is s good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Good torque
customer_reviews.text: Like the power this air tool has. Great for the around the garage handyman. Gets the job done!

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Used this for first time today to do brake job on my truck.. It took lugs off wit no problem Used with 6 gal compressor. 150psi cfm 2.6

customer_reviews.title: very good and for the price
customer_reviews.text: did its job, very good and for the price, you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is working great for the jobs we needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Collingwood

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty Impact wrench
customer_reviews.text: Using this at my motorcycle dealership. Seems to be built durable, has plenty of torque. Both my mechanics love it. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Badass
customer_reviews.text: This thing is probably five times stronger than my previous gun. Has three power settings too which is great for more broad use.
customer_reviews.author: Trump

customer_reviews.title: Good price - Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good price - Good product. Also unknown until I checked out that DeWalt had an additional 20% off special going on! Fast shipping through Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Well built and definitely worth the money.. Would advise buying it, fast and reliable and has a manufacturer warranty
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this impact gun. The build quality is quite solid and feels nice in my hand. I've used several IR in the past I loved them all but I couldn't justify the price for my new small home setup. I have multiple Dewalt 20V tools and did not know they had this air impact until I accidentally stumbled upon it. I decided to give this a shot since I have a small compressor and with upgraded fittings, this thing works great for half the price of an IR I was about to buy. I've only used it for suspension and lug nuts so far on a oiled 20-gallon.
customer_reviews.author: L33.T

customer_reviews.title: ... a few times but I am liking it just fine. There is only one minor thing I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times but I am liking it just fine. There is only one minor thing I can find wrong with it and that is that the Foward/Reverse selector switch is a bit too easy to move. I haven't hit it while I have been using it, but I tend to knock it out of position when picking it up or putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: this tool is very good. quiet and very
customer_reviews.text: i use it every day at work. this tool is very good. quiet and very strong

customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact, but very weak for an impact wrench. Will not break lug nuts torqued to spec.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great gun has tons of power. Seems to hold up very well and is from a quality maker. Would recommend it to family and friends.

customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2017 and still using today daily at work. Considering buying a second just to have a backup

customer_reviews.title: perfect gun, works great
customer_reviews.text: perfect gun, works great,has the power i am looking looking for, if it holds up like all my other dewalt products i will be a happy person thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Diesel Mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diesel tech and this impact has been really doing its job. This impact has heavy speed and easily removed stuck bolts on shocks. Forget about snap on Dewalt is cheaper and gets the job done quicker
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. If you have a compressor and don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. If you have a compressor and don't have an impact driver, give this one a look.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the best cheap priced gun i have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Calvin E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with DeWalt!
customer_reviews.text: Great Impact Gun! I've used this on my vehicles from everything between replacing struts, to loosening rusted engine mount bolts, and loosening/tightening suspension parts. Works fantastic, so long as you have enough air to supply to it. I've been using a tiny pancake compressor (since it's all I have) and the compressor does ok for intermittent use. I know for certain this gun would perform even better if I had a nicer compressor. Just keep in mind that this gun needs more air than small compressors can kick out, and pay attention to the rated torque this gun provides. Use it for what it's limitations are and it performs amazingly! Highly recommended! DeWalt wins again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Impact Air wrench I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, every time. Great quality. Should of bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Quality
customer_reviews.text: With Dewalt it seems hard to go wrong...just maintain your tools
customer_reviews.author: EARL C SCOGGINS JR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome impact!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome impact for the price! Keeps up to impacts that are twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drew B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a different brand impact driver. He liked it and it worked. However, it just wasn't that powerful. He wouldn't budge parts that he needed to. Stuck parts were not going to come off. Ordered this and it was a huge improvement. The parts he had tried repeatedly to remove were easy to remove. This impact driver removed them as if they were nothing. This is also handy to have for simple jobs like rotating your tires and such. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: M&J

customer_reviews.title: $70 Cheaper here on Amazon and very happy with its performance! It worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was struggling getting a bolt off an old 67 Impala he was working on and finally broke down and bought this with the Christmas special Amazon was running. It broke that bolt loose in a blink after days of struggling with it. So he was very happy with its performance. Plus as a bonus it was about $70 cheaper here on Amazon than at our local building supply store that I cannot mention but it rhymes with owes.....
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! I love this tool. E-Z to operate. It has the power your looking for. A Well built tool. Just a excellent tool. Thanks Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie star73

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful impact feels good in the hand and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful impact feels good in the hand and you can't beat the price! I don't see why these aren't more popular!
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Hearst

customer_reviews.title: This impact is amazing. Hands down wish I would have found this ...
customer_reviews.text: This impact is amazing. Hands down wish I would have found this sooner. I purchased the 1/2 and 3/8 air impact and couldn't be happier. Don't think twice about the Dewalt air tools great warranty and amazing performance.
customer_reviews.author: bradford cover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful tried about every impact this is the best
customer_reviews.author: David E. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Have a bad back and it just about does me in to put snow tires on my wife's nad my car. This spun the lug nuts off without a problem and put them back on. Checked them with a star wrench and they were all plenty tight. Should have ordered one of these wrenches years ago. Have an old craftsman but it won't handle the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding little impact wrench!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this impact wrench!! It's smaller and lighter than the other ones I have. And the best part is that it doesn't break your wrist!! With the adjustable torque setting it's like nothing I've seen before. I almost sent it back until I used it, figured this small wrench wouldn't be able to do anything....this little wrench is loosening bolts that other wrenches can't even come close to loosening!! Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Durango43

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this impact driver to use at home. Used it a few times and it seems to be a fine tool. Just what I needed to replace my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Terry@Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Works as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this unit. Strong and durable feeling. The 3 presets are handy for torquing in sequence. I checked the torque values on each setting with a torque wrench and they were consistent. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MisterBee

product_meta.title: DEWALT Impact Wrench, Square Drive, Heavy Duty, 1/2-Inch (DWMT70773L)
product_meta.description: The DEWALT DWMT70773L 1/2" Square Drive Impact Wrench-Heavy Duty offers a maximum torque at 650 ft-lbs whichs helps to break free fasteners that are stubborn or stuck. The 7500 RPM (Free Speed at90PSI) helps provide high power fastening, with a twin hammer mechanism. This impact wrench features one hand operation - it has a forward/reverse switch for quick and easy directional changes - along with an adjustable power regulator. This impact wrench offers a composite body design, and ergonomic handle with rubber cushion grip, and a bottom handle exhaust. It is also designed with shock resistant housing bumpers that help to protect the housing and prevent scuffing. It operates at 1100 bpm (blows/minute), has a 1/4-inch air inlet, maximum air flow of 5.9 CFM.
feature_bullets: Maximum Torque 650 ft-lb helps to break free fasteners
7500 RPM (Free Speed at90PSI) for high power fastening
Twin hammer mechanism and adjustable power regulator
